nifty.explanation:
Element "Odštevalnik" je razvit in podprt s strani niftyimages.com izključno za namen pregleda.

Kakovost elementa "Odštevalnik" bomo lahko zagotovili samo za naročnike, kar bo omogočeno to jesen.

adaptContainersControl.explanation.off: Zaboji strukture se bodo na mobilnih napravah nahajali v eni vrstici. To lahko pri vsebinah z veliko širino privede do nepravilnega prikaza (velike besede, itd.).

appearance.control.buttonOutlook.descrip: This option ensures the most accurate display of your buttons in MS Outlook email clients by inserting a special VML-code element. When this option is activated, the email message size can be increased up to kilobyte for each added button.
banner.size.label: Banner height
banner.size.help.tooltip: With this control, you set what area of a banner image to display in emails.

synchronizableModuleControl.label: Sinhroniziran modul
synchronizableModuleControl.description: Whenever you make changes to this module (and update it), these changes will be automatically applied to all other templates / email messages where you used this synchronizable module
